languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} selects an ally. Until the end of combat, attacks made by the Bladedancer against enemies who have already attacked that ally gain +{uip|CriticalChance|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and +{uip|CriticalDamage|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} do not stack.

traits.locale_text:
Reaper selects an ally. Until the end of combat, Reaper's attacks have {uip|CriticalChance|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682} additional critical hit chance and {uip|CriticalDamage|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682} critical damage against enemies that had already attacked that ally.
This effect does not stack. This ability can be used any number of times each turn. This ability can be used any number of times each turn.

The Bladedancer selects an ally. Until the end of combat, the Bladedancer's attacks against enemies that had already attacked that ally gain +{uip|CriticalChance|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}% critical hit chance and +{uip|CriticalDamage|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}% critical damage.
This ability can be used multiple times per turn but the bonuses do not stack.

The Bladedancer selects an ally. Until the end of combat, the Bladedancer's attacks against enemies that had already attacked that ally gain +{uip|CriticalChance|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}% critical hit chance and +{uip|CriticalDamage|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}% critical damage.
This ability can be used multiple times per turn but the bonuses do not stack.

The Bladedancer selects an ally. Until the end of combat, attacks made by the Bladedancer against enemies who have already attacked that ally gain +{uip|CriticalChance|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}% critical hit chance and +{uip|CriticalDamage|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}% critical damage.
This ability can be used multiple times per turn, but the bonuses do not stack.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} selects an ally. Until the end of combat, attacks made by the Bladedancer against enemies who have already attacked that ally gain +{uip|CriticalChance|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and +{uip|CriticalDamage|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} do not stack.

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} selecciona a un aliado. Hasta el final del combate, los ataques del hoja danzante contra los enemigos que hayan atacado a ese aliado ganan +{uip|CriticalChance|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} y +{uip|CriticalDamage|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} crítico.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se puede usar varias veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, pero las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} no se acumulan.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}は味方1体を選択する。戦闘が終了するまで、その味方がすでに攻撃した敵にブレードダンサーが攻撃すると、+{uip|CriticalChance|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}%の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット率{/g}とクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+{uip|CriticalDamage|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}%を得る。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に複数回使用できるが、{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}はスタックしない。

この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に複数回使用できるが、{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}はスタックしない。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}选择一名盟友。当刀锋舞者攻击在本场战斗中攻击过该盟友的敌人时，刀锋舞者的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高{uip|CriticalChance|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}%，暴击{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|CriticalDamage|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}%，效果持续至战斗结束。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}可以在单个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中多次使用，但{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}不会叠加。

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} sélectionne un allié. Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les attaques du danselame contre les ennemis ayant déjà attaqué cet allié gagnent +{uip|CriticalChance|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} et + {uip|CriticalDamage|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} critiques.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, mais les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} ne se cumulent pas.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} do not stack.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} wählt einen Verbündeten. Bis zum Ende des Kampfes haben Angriffe des Klingentänzers auf Gegner, die diesen Verbündeten bereits angegriffen haben, +{uip|CriticalChance|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682} % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Kritische Trefferchance{/g} und +{uip|CriticalDamage|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682} % kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann mehrmals pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} eingesetzt werden, aber die {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} sind nicht stapelbar.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Танцор смерти{/g} выбирает союзника. До конца боя атаки танцора смерти против врагов, которые ранее атаковали этого союзника, получают +{uip|CriticalChance|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g} и +{uip|CriticalDamage|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}% к критическому урону.{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}{/g}
Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} может использоваться несколько раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, но {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} при этом не суммируются.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, bir dost birim seçer. Kılıç Dansçısı tarafından o dost birime saldırmış düşmanlara yapılan saldırıların {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g} +%{uip|CriticalChance|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682} ve kritik {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} +%{uip|CriticalDamage|3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682} artar. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g} üst üste birikmez.
